title: Microsoft to cut 7,800 jobs
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Jul 8, 2015, 14:48 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 42 mins Microsoft to cut 7,800 jobs Reuters – 25 minutes ago View Photo 
A shadow is cast near the Microsoft logo at the 2015 Computex exhibition in Taipei, Taiwan, June 3, 2015. … 
(Reuters) - Microsoft Corp said on Wednesday it would cut 7,800 jobs, mostly in its phone hardware business, to reduce costs and streamline its operations. 
The company also said it would record an impairment charge of about $7.6 billion related to its acquisition of Nokia's handset business. 
Microsoft said it would take a restructuring charge of about $750-$850 million.
